sfField.summary: set by the system, please do not modify
users can override the probability during a stage
upon creation of Opportunity the system sets the close date to 30 days from the create date by workflow - user can update the date accordingly
This field tracks many times an Opportunity has been pushed from month to month.
Date the coordination call flag was updated- updated by system workflow.
Enter notes for the Coordination Call, if checked.

sfField.formula:
IF (
(Owner.ProfileId = "00eE0000000Nuc9") && 
(TEXT (Type) = "Upsell" || TEXT (Type) = "Downsell" || TEXT (Type) = "Cancellation"),
NBA_Amount__c * Probability,
IF(
(Owner.ProfileId = "00eE0000000Nuc9") && 
(TEXT (Type) = "New Business" || TEXT (Type) = "Renewal"),
Amount * Probability,
Amount * Probability
)
)

sfField.summary: Check if a website product is included.
Check this box if a Coordination Call is needed.
Updated by any sales user that requires assistance from another BU.

sfField.formula: IF( CloseDate < today() && IsClosed = False, \n IMAGE("https://c.na9.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015E0000001Gjka", "update close Date" ), NULL)

sfField.summary: Formula field that reads the Parent Account Name from the Account.

The BU Type must be selected with the appropriate BU (i.e. ATC Media, KBB, TIM, vAuto,etc ) in order to be captured in reporting. The “Dealer Interested Product” field is only added to the opportunity title.
This field is a total of the NBA Amount field below in the Product line items

Field visible by Admin's only - and allows for system to determine if a new opp needs to be included into a coordination call prior to progressing - only counts open opportunities in planning or presentation stage.
This is a utility field used by integration with Lightning Connect to Cox Media Org.
Used to count opportunities on an opportunity and product report. Only visible to COE Admin profile
Updated by system workflow when a user updates the Coordination Call flag to true.
A field used to manually enter the products added to the opportunity.

This is a field that is installed by and used with the Adoption Dashboard AppExchange package. If your org already has a similar field, you can change the reports that are part of the Adoption Dashboard package to use your custom field and can delete this field.
This field is installed by Riptide Pop-up Alerts and is used in conjunction with the Pop-up Alert S-Control.
